description:
This plugin allows you to switch the flashlight / torch of the device on and off.

Works on iOS 5+
Works on Android 2+
Android 6+ runtime permissions are handled automatically
Works on WP8
Depends on capabilities of the device, so you can test it with an API call
name: FlashLight
shortDescription: This plugin allows you to switch the flashlight / torch of the device on and off.

eventsFunctions.description: switch the flashlight / torch of the device off
eventsFunctions.name: switchOff
eventsFunctions.sentence: switch the flashlight / torch of the device off

eventsFunctions.description: switch the flashlight / torch of the device on
eventsFunctions.name: switchOn
eventsFunctions.sentence: switch the flashlight / torch of the device on

eventsFunctions.description: you'll want to make sure the torch is switched off when the app is exited via the backbutton. Otherwise, the camera may be locked so it can't be used by other apps
eventsFunctions.name: _onExit
eventsFunctions.sentence: switch the flashlight / torch off on exit

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the device flash light is switched on
eventsFunctions.name: _isOn
